events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the device arrived with a large scratch on the screen and it does not work properly.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect due to damage and malfunction described by the customer.
An agent specializing in product defects has been assigned to handle the case regarding the damaged device.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your device. I’m here to help you with this defect.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and describe any other problems you have noticed?
I’ve attached several pictures showing the scratch and the screen flickers intermittently when I power it on.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement device shipped immediately or a full refund if you prefer.
I’d prefer the replacement device, thanks for the quick response and helpful solution.
We have processed the replacement order and you will receive tracking details shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the replacement device and that everything is working as expected now.
Yes, I received the replacement and it’s perfect. Thanks again for the excellent service.
Thank you for confirming. We are closing this case now but feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with our support. Your feedback is appreciated.
